attributes.additional_details:
Draconian laws, corrupt corporatism and foreign intervention show the true nature of government. The solution is not more government and the solution isn't to revert to some form of communist anarchism either.

Allow human beings freedom to solve their own problems and obtain true happiness through liberty over their bodies and property.

Abolish all forms of statism such as:

• Taxation - Including all forms of coercion and monetary fraud such as inflating a legalised monopoly currency.
• State Monopolies - Including NHS, state police and infrastructure.
• Market Distortions - Patents, copyrights, regulations, licensing, subsidies and tax as above. These market distortions aid the corporate aristocracy and harm everyone else.
• Victimless crimes - It shouldn't be a crime to do anything which does not aggress against others.
• Compulsion - No more forcing people to do things they do not want to do. Everything must be voluntary.
